verbs.description: [ARG1: asia stocks] [V: rise] [ARGM-CAU: on the back of an overnight bounce] [ARGM-LOC: on wall street asia] stocks largely rose on monday following a strong performance overnight on wall street after the release of strong quarterly results from some of the largest u s companies cnbc nikkei osaka topix jamal khashoggi japan taiwan samsung electronics federal reserve chicago shanghai asia marcelo claure peter andersen president donald trump shenzhen australia andersen capital management u s chief operating officer donald trump china softbank south korea jerome powell cio shanghai west virginia fox business hong kong
